full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Two Physicians

## Request Summary

Transport Canada is soliciting proposals for the delivery of medical services, including the assessment of seafarer fitness for work on board a vessel, development of medical standards, education, and training for Marine Medical Examiners (MMEs). This requirement is for a one-year contract with two one-year option periods, exercisable by Transport Canada.

## Request Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01006720
* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-09
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-04, 14:00:00 EST
* **Regions:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada

## Opportunity Description

The Department of Transport Canada is seeking two physicians with expertise in medicine and medical standards to perform tasks including, but not limited to:

*   Assessment of seafarer fitness for work on board a vessel
*   Development of medical standards for seafarers on board a vessel
*   Education and training for Marine Medical Examiners (MMEs)

These physicians will be required to provide services on-site in Ottawa. Accommodations for remote work may be made available for qualified individuals who are unable to travel to Ottawa.

## Evaluation Criteria

An evaluation process will be conducted to select the best candidate(s) to fulfill the requirements of this request. The evaluation will be based on the following criteria:

*   Relevant education and experience
*   Expertise in medical standards for seafarers on board a vessel

## Request and Proposal Documents

A Request for Proposal document is available for download from the Canada Buys website. Interested parties can view the complete tender information by visiting the website and searching for the tender reference number PW-22-01006720.

For More information, please reach out to:
Fanie Charron
Email: [fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca](mailto:fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca)
Phone: 343 574-8173

---
